speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Mine Host of the Garter!

speaker: HOST
text: What says my bullyrook? Speak scholarly and

speaker: HOST
text: wisely.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Truly, mine Host, I must turn away some of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: my followers.

speaker: HOST
text: Discard, bully Hercules, cashier. Let them wag;

speaker: HOST
text: trot, trot.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I sit at ten pounds a week.

speaker: HOST
text: Thou ’rt an emperor—Caesar, Keiser, and

speaker: HOST
text: Pheazar. I will entertain Bardolph. He shall draw,

speaker: HOST
text: he shall tap. Said I well, bully Hector?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Do so, good mine Host.

speaker: HOST
text: I have spoke. Let him follow.—Let me see thee

speaker: HOST
text: froth and lime. I am at a word. Follow.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Bardolph, follow him. A tapster is a good

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: trade. An old cloak makes a new jerkin, a withered

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: servingman a fresh tapster. Go. Adieu.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: It is a life that I have desired. I will thrive.

speaker: PISTOL
text: O base Hungarian wight, wilt thou the spigot

speaker: PISTOL
text: wield?

speaker: NYM
text: He was gotten in drink. Is not the humor

speaker: NYM
text: conceited?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I am glad I am so acquit of this tinderbox.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: His thefts were too open. His filching was like an

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: unskillful singer; he kept not time.

speaker: NYM
text: The good humor is to steal at a minute’s rest.

speaker: PISTOL
text: “Convey,” the wise it call. “Steal”? Foh, a fico

speaker: PISTOL
text: for the phrase!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Well, sirs, I am almost out at heels.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Why, then, let kibes ensue.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: There is no remedy. I must cony-catch, I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: must shift.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Young ravens must have food.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Which of you know Ford of this town?

speaker: PISTOL
text: I ken the wight. He is of substance good.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: My honest lads, I will tell you what I am

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: about.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Two yards and more.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: No quips now, Pistol. Indeed, I am in the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: waist two yards about, but I am now about no

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: waste; I am about thrift. Briefly, I do mean to make

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: love to Ford’s wife. I spy entertainment in her. She

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: discourses; she carves; she gives the leer of invitation.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I can construe the action of her familiar style;

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and the hardest voice of her behavior, to be Englished

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: rightly, is “I am Sir John Falstaff’s.”

speaker: PISTOL
text: He hath studied her will and

speaker: PISTOL
text: translated her will—out of honesty into English.

speaker: NYM
text: The anchor is deep. Will that

speaker: NYM
text: humor pass?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Now, the report goes, she has all the rule of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: her husband’s purse. He hath a legion of angels.

speaker: PISTOL
text: As many devils entertain, and

speaker: PISTOL
text: “To her, boy,” say I.

speaker: NYM
text: The humor rises; it is good.

speaker: NYM
text: Humor me the angels.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I have writ me here a

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: letter to her; and here another to Page’s wife, who

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: even now gave me good eyes too, examined my

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: parts with most judicious oeillades. Sometimes

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: the beam of her view gilded my foot, sometimes

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: my portly belly.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Then did the sun on dunghill

speaker: PISTOL
text: shine.

speaker: NYM
text: I thank thee for that humor.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: O, she did so course o’er my exteriors with

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: such a greedy intention that the appetite of her

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: eye did seem to scorch me up like a burning-glass.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Here’s another letter to her. She bears the purse

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: too; she is a region in Guiana, all gold and bounty.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I will be cheaters to them both, and they shall be

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: exchequers to me; they shall be my East and West

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Indies, and I will trade to them both. Go bear thou

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: this letter to Mistress Page—and thou this to Mistress

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Ford. We will thrive, lads, we will thrive.

speaker: PISTOL
text:
Shall
               
              I
               
              Sir
               
              Pandarus
               
              of
               
              Troy
               
              become
              ,

speaker: PISTOL
text:
And
               
              by
               
              my
               
              side
               
              wear
               
              steel
              ?
               
              Then
               
              Lucifer
               
              take
               
              all
              !

speaker: NYM
text: I will run no base humor. Here, take

speaker: NYM
text: the humor-letter. I will keep the havior of

speaker: NYM
text: reputation.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
Hold
              ,
               
              sirrah
              ,
               
              bear
               
              you
               
              these
               
              letters
               
              tightly
              ;

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
Sail
               
              like
               
              my
               
              pinnace
               
              to
               
              these
               
              golden
               
              shores
              .
              —

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
Rogues
              ,
               
              hence
              ,
               
              avaunt
              ,
               
              vanish
               
              like
               
              hailstones
              ,
               
              go
              ,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
Trudge
              ,
               
              plod
               
              away
               
              i’
               
              th’
               
              hoof
              ,
               
              seek
               
              shelter
              ,
               
              pack
              !

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
Falstaff
               
              will
               
              learn
               
              the
               
              humor
               
              of
               
              the
               
              age
              :

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
French
               
              thrift
              ,
               
              you
               
              rogues
              —
              myself
               
              and
               
              skirted
               
              page
              .

speaker: PISTOL
text:
Let
               
              vultures
               
              gripe
               
              thy
               
              guts
              !
               
              For
               
              gourd
               
              and
               
              fullam
               
              holds
              ,

speaker: PISTOL
text:
And
               
              high
               
              and
               
              low
               
              beguiles
               
              the
               
              rich
               
              and
               
              poor
              .

speaker: PISTOL
text:
Tester
               
              I’ll
               
              have
               
              in
               
              pouch
               
              when
               
              thou
               
              shalt
               
              lack
              ,

speaker: PISTOL
text:
Base
               
              Phrygian
               
              Turk
              !

speaker: NYM
text: I have operations which be humors of revenge.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Wilt thou revenge?

speaker: NYM
text: By welkin and her star!

speaker: PISTOL
text: With wit or steel?

speaker: NYM
text: With both the humors, I. I will discuss the

speaker: NYM
text: humor of this love to Ford.

speaker: PISTOL
text:
PISTOL
            
            
              
                And
                 
                I
                 
                to
                 
                Page
                 
                shall
                 
                eke
                 
                unfold
              
              
                How
                 
                Falstaff
                ,
                 
                varlet
                 
                vile
                ,
              
              
                His
                 
                dove
                 
                will
                 
                prove
                ,
                 
                his
                 
                gold
                 
                will
                 
                hold
                ,
              
              
                And
                 
                his
                 
                soft
                 
                couch
                 
                defile
                .

speaker: NYM
text: My humor shall not cool. I will incense Ford to

speaker: NYM
text: deal with poison. I will possess him with yellowness,

speaker: NYM
text: for the revolt of mine is dangerous. That is

speaker: NYM
text: my true humor.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Thou art the Mars of malcontents. I second

speaker: PISTOL
text: thee. Troop on.
